title: Elevate Your Performance with Core Balance®
description: Core Balance is one of the leading producers of equine supplements. We use only quality ingredients at sufficient levels to maximize your horses benefits.
cleaned_text: with No Fillers. Proudly made in the USA. At our core, we are committed to elevating the health and performance of today's equine athletes. As a US-based organization, we proudly craft our products from all-natural, highest quality ingredients, leveraging innovative scientific formulations. Our transparent and precise labeling ensures our customers know exactly what they're giving their horses, thereby supporting enhanced nutritional utilization. We strive to be a comprehensive solution, offering products that not only protect joints and reduce stress but also bolster mental and physical aptitude. We are devoted to supporting every aspect of the equine lifecycle, from promoting fertility and proper growth to enhancing focus and concentration, and encouraging healthy weight gain. We are passionate about empowering horse owners, breeders, and trainers with products that deliver on our promise: Better
